duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide one-on-one tutoring to students in English, Math, Science, Elementary, Special Education, Reading Literacy, and Subject-specific areas.
Assist students in developing study skills and positive learning habits.
Work directly with students to help them achieve success in school.
Adhere to the center's schedule and tutoring requirements.
Utilize instructional methods to engage and motivate students in learning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Education or related field (Teaching certification required for work with elementary and middle school students)
